Name: Filling Out the Compendium
Purchase:
The Hyrule Compendium on your Purah Pad
will automatically register pictures of creatures,
monsters, materials, equipment, and treasure
you take with your <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>.

Robbie invited you to <clr:0000>purchase <clr:ffff>pictures
you haven't captured yet from his own
Hyrule Compendium.
Complete:
The Hyrule Compendium on your Purah Pad
will automatically register pictures of creatures,
monsters, materials, equipment, and treasure
you take with your <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>. From now on, you
can still purchase Hyrule Compendium pictures
you haven't bought for yourself yet by selecting
them from <clr:0000>Robbie's compendium<clr:ffff>.
